name: Minggl
overview: Minggl is a social interaction manager. The Minggl toolbar aims to make it easy to manage information, communication, and navigation across social networks. Minggl brings social sites together in one place, feeding the user the status and latest activities of friends no matter where he is on the web. By installing the Minggl toolbar, users can stay active with their entire social circle anytime they have a web browser open. Minggl allows the user to consolidate friends from across sites into their browser sidebar, autolog into all their social network profiles, update status on multiple sites from one place, get notifications of mail, comments, and friend activity, and set privacy rules that allow for the display of different content on user profiles based on which friends are viewing.

milestones.description: Minggl Launches Political Wall Facebook application.
milestones.source_text:
Today Minggl is joining a growing number of services geared towards the U.S. presidential election. In combination with its new Facebook application The-New-Faces-at-Facebook , comments made towards Obama or McCain can be seen by Minggl users on the candidatesâ€™ respective websites.

minggl political wall comments

Mingglâ€™s new Facebook application, called the Political Wall, lets you vote for one candidate or the other, leave a comment explaining why you voted that way, and invite others to do the same. Thereâ€™s a comment wall that will appear in your Facebook profile, where you and your friends can debate the upcoming presidential election, and Minggl will also display these running comments on Obama and McCainâ€™s websites for users that have the Minggl toolbar installed. Users can then vote on the comments, so the most popular will rise to the top.

Minggl is a content aggregator in its own right, providing a central location for consuming Web content, creating an individualized browsing experience, and sharing this content with others in a controlled, distributive manner. The new Facebook application highlights Mingglâ€™s capabilities across its core competencies, and should gain enough attention, given its focus on politics.
milestones.source_description: Minggl Gets Political with New Facebook App
